rukus.text: Fan zai tiandi jian de, dou zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de

Zai chuci fangzhu de shihou, ta ceng jiang xinfeng “shengjing” er buxin “gulanjing” zhe cong tamen de jiazhong quzhu chujing. Nimen meiyou caixiang dao tamen hui tui chuqu, tamen caixiang ziji de baolei neng fangyu zhenzhu; dan zhenzhu de xingfa, jing cong tamen liao bu dao di difang jianglin tamen. Ta jiang kongbu tou zai tamen de xinzhong, tamen yong ziji de shou he xinshimen de shou chaihui ziji de fangwu. You yanguang de renmen a! Nimen jingti ba
Jiaruo zhenzhu meiyou panjue tamen ying shou fangzhu, ta bi zai jinshi chengfa tamen; tamen zai houshi, jiang shou huoxing
Zhe shi youyu tamen weikang zhenzhu he shizhe. Fan weikang zhenzhu zhe, zhenzhu biding chengfa ta, yin wei zhenzhu de xingfa que shi yanli de
Wulun nimen kanfa hai zao shu, huo ren qi yiran cunzai, dou shi zhenzhu suo zhunxu de, ta zhunxu fa shu, yuan wei lingru fangdang zhe
Fan zhenzhu shou gui shizhe de ni chan, nimen dou meiyou han ma zhi lao; dan zhenzhu shi zhong shizhe, zhifu tasuo yiyu zhe; zhenzhu duiyu wanshi, shi quanneng de

Chengshi de jumin de ni chan, fan zhenzhu shou gui shizhe de, dou guizhenzhu, shizhe, zhiqin, gu'er, pinmin he luke, yimian naxie ni chan, cheng wei zai nimen zhong fuhao zhi jian zhouzhuan de dongxi. Fan shizhe gei nimen de, nimen dou yingdang jieshou; fan shizhe jinzhi nimen de, nimen dou yingdang jiechu. Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, zhenzhu que shi xingfa yanli de

Naxie ni chan yibufen gui qian shi zhong de pinmin, tamen ceng bei quzhu chujing, yizhi sangshi ziji de fangwu he caichan. Tamen xunqiu cong zhenzhu fachu de endian he xiyue, tamen xiezhu zhenzhu he shizhe; zhe deng ren, que shi chengshi de

Zai tamen zhiqian, anju guxiang erqie quexin zhengdao de renmen, tamen xi 411 ai qianju lai de jiao baomen, tamen duiyu naxie jiao bao suo huo de shangci, bu huai yuanhen, tamen sui you jixu, ye yuan ba ziji suoyou de rang gei naxie jiao bao. Neng jiechu zishen de tan lin zhe, cai shi chenggong de

Zai tamen zhihou daolai de renmen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni she you women, bing she you zai women zhiqian yijing xindao de jiao baomen, qiu ni buyao rang women yuanhen zai women zhiqian yijing xindao de renmen, women de zhu a! Ni que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.”§
